name: browser-bunyan
description: Bunyan logging specifically for the browser
author: Phil Mander <philip.mander@gmail.com>

scripts.prepublish: npm run lint && npm test && npm run build && npm run copy-types
scripts.build: ../../node_modules/.bin/microbundle --name bunyan --external none && ../../node_modules/.bin/mkdirp dist && cp lib/index.umd.js dist/browser-bunyan.min.js
